s0362: Jie Ni said: 'The whole world is flooded, who can change it?
s0363: Rather than follow those who avoid certain people, better to follow those who avoid the world!'
s0364: Planted his hoe and would not speak.
s0365: Zi Lu returned and told Confucius, Confucius sadly said: 'One cannot herd with birds and beasts.
s0366: If the world has the Way, I will not change it.'
s0368: Another day, Zi Lu was walking, encountered an old man carrying a hoe, said: 'Have you seen my master?'
s0369: The old man said: 'Your four limbs are not diligent, five grains not distinguished, who is your master!'
s0371: Zi Lu returned and told Confucius, Confucius said: 'A recluse.'
s0372: Went back again, but he had left.
s0373: Confucius stayed in Cai three years, Wu attacked Chen.
s0374: Chu rescued Chen, camped at Cheng Fu.
s0375: Heard Confucius was between Chen and Cai, Chu sent someone to invite Confucius.
s0376: Confucius was about to go and perform the ritual visit, Chen and Cai ministers plotted: 'Confucius is worthy, his criticisms all hit the feudal lords' illnesses.
s0377: Now he has stayed long between Chen and Cai, all the conduct set by the ministers is not according to Zhong Ni's intent.
s0378: Now Chu is a great state, comes to invite Confucius.
s0379: If Confucius is employed in Chu, then Chen and Cai's governing ministers will be in danger.'
s0380: Thus together raised laborers and surrounded Confucius in the wilds.
s0381: Could not proceed, cut off provisions.
s0382: Followers were ill, none could rise.
s0383: Confucius lectured and recited, played strings and sang without decline.
s0384: Zi Lu indignantly appeared, said: 'Do gentlemen also have poverty?'
s0385: Confucius said: 'Gentlemen are indeed poor, petty men when poor then become unruly.'
s0388: Confucius said: 'Ci, do you take me for one who has learned much and knows it?'
s0394: Confucius knew his disciples had resentful hearts, thus summoned Zi Lu and asked: 'The Poetry says "Not rhinoceros not tiger, following that wilderness".
s0397: Zi Lu said: 'Perhaps we are not yet benevolent?
s0399: Perhaps we do not yet know?
s0402: You, supposing benevolent people must be trusted, how would there be Bo Yi and Shu Qi?
s0403: Supposing knowledgeable people must be practiced, how would there be Prince Bi Gan?'
s0405: Zi Lu went out, Zi Gong entered to see.
s0406: Confucius said: 'Ci, the Poetry says "Not rhinoceros not tiger, following that wilderness".
s0409: Zi Gong said: 'The Master's Way is extremely great, therefore All Under Heaven cannot contain the Master.
s0410: The Master should perhaps lower himself a bit?'
s0411: Confucius said: 'Ci, good farmers can plant but cannot harvest, good craftsmen can be skillful but cannot be compliant.
s0412: Gentlemen can cultivate their Way, outline and record it, unify and govern it, but cannot make accommodation.
s0413: Now you do not cultivate your Way but seek accommodation.
s0414: Ci, your ambitions are not far-reaching!'
